Package it.polimi.ingsw.GUI

  • Class Summary 
    Class Description
    BeginningMatchWindow
    It is the waiting window before the beginning of the match.
    ChallengerWindow
    It is the window where the challenger can choose the gods he wants to play with.
    ChooseGodWindow
    It is the window where the player can choose the god to play with, among those chosen by the challenger.
    ExistingGameWindow
    It is the window where the player types a gameID ot play an existing match with friends.
    GameWindow
    It has a static GUIHandler as an attribute.
    GUIHandler
    It is the interface of GUI towards and backwards network.
    GUILauncher
    It launches the graphical user interface
    ModeWindow
    It is the window where the player can choose the way she/he wants to start a game.
    NewGameWindow
    It is the window where the player chooses the number of players.
    NicknameWindow
    It is the window where the player can choose a nickname.
    TableWindow
    It is the window where the match is actually played.
    WaitingWindow
    It is the window where the player waits for other players to join the match.
    WelcomeWindow
    It describes every graphical object implemented in the starting window of the application.
  • Enum Summary 
    Enum Description
    Mode
    It contains all the possible choices a player can take to start playing.
